area_name: East Wall South End (Chesire for President Area)

climbs.name: Rangers' Revenge
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, Kip Knapp, Dan Wirth & Nina Burnell 11-1992

content.description: Start about eight feet right of Ramble On. Boulder up then go up and left to a widening crack/slot that takes you through the upper headwall. Climb the easy but runout face to the top.
content.protection: Carry large gear for the widening slot section.
content.location: Start about eight feet right of Ramble On.

content.description: Start in the middle of the corridor, to the right of Don't Tread on Me. Boulder up a bulge to the right of a roof. Go left in horizontal cracks roughly 30 feet then up past three bolts (crossing Don't Tread on Me).
content.protection: Typical JT rack and three bolts.
content.location: Start in the middle of the corridor, to the right of Don't Tread on Me.

climbs.name: Don't Tread on Me
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, Kip Knapp, Dan Wirth & Nina Burnell 11-1992

content.description: To the right of Chesire For President is a corridor with a large face on the right (east/toward the road). This climb starts in the furthest back portion where you can chimney. Chimney up then climb straight up the face past two bolts.
content.protection: This route was originally done with no protection. The bolts were placed when Ramble On was established.
content.location: To the right of Chesire For President is a corridor with a large face on the right (east/toward the road). This climb starts in the furthest back portion where you can chimney.

climbs.name: Chesire For President
climbs.fa: Todd Swain, Cooper & Hanna Mohn, Chesire Gagnon 04-2004

content.description: Scramble up boulders about eight feet then traverse on a sloping ledge under the ceiling to a vertical crack. Climb the crack through the ceiling (crux), then continue up to the top of the crack. Climb the face above past one bolt to the top. This was ChesireÂ’s first rock climb (she was 13 years old at the time).
content.protection: Carry some finger and hand sized cams to supplement the bolts. Rappel from the anchor.
content.location: This climb is located about 100 feet to the right of Wacko Wall and roughly 50 feet left of Ramble On. It is across the gully (to the west) of Ramble On, at a pillar/boulder with an obvious crack through a ceiling.

content.description: Start roughly 50 feet right of the mouth of the corridor where Rangers' Revenge is located. Climb the right crack through a roof that is close to the ground.
content.location: Start roughly 50 feet right of the mouth of the corridor where Rangers' Revenge is located.

pathTokens: East Wall South End (Chesire for President Area)
